edu.biu.scapi.securityLevel

Interface UC

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProtocolSecLevel, SecurityLevel, StandAlone
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OTUCDDHOnByteArrayReceiver, OTUCDDHOnByteArraySender, OTUCDDHOnGroupElementReceiver, OTUCDDHOnGroupElementSender

    public interface UC
extends StandAlone
    Any protocol that is universally composable (aka. UC-secure) should implement this interface.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)
